item.title: BL-84 West at ID-19 - Caldwell
item.description: BL-84 West at ID-19 in Caldwell. Turn left for ID-19 West to Wilder and Homedale. Turn right to continue on BL-84 West to I-84.

item.title: BL-84 West Approaching ID-19 - Caldwell
item.description: BL-84 West (Blaine St.) Approaching ID-19 in Caldwell

item.title: BL-84 West (Blaine St.) at CR-K2 (S 10th Ave.)
item.description: BL-84 West (Blaine St.) at CR-K2 (S 10th Ave.) in Caldwell.

item.title: BL-84 - Caldwell
item.description: BL-84 West in Caldwell on Blaine St. Speed Limit 35 MPH.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 27
item.description: I-84 East approaching Exit 27 - BL-84/ID-19/Caldwell/Homedale.

item.title: End BL-84 East at I-84/US-30/ID-55
item.description: End BL-84 East at I-84/US-30/ID-55 in Nampa. Merge right for I-84/US-30 East and ID-55 north to Meridian and Boise; continue under freeway for I-84/US-30 West and ID-55 south to Caldwell.

item.title: BL-84 East Approaching I-84/US-30/ID-55
item.description: BL-84 East approaching I-84/US-30/ID-55 (Exit 38) in Nampa. This is the east end of the Nampa business loop.

item.title: BL-84 East - Franklin Road
item.description: BL-84 East at Franklin Road junction. Merge right to continue east on BL-84. East of Franklin Road, BL-84 follows Garrity Blvd.

item.title: BL-84 East - Nampa
item.description: BL-84 East along 11th Ave. North in downtown Nampa

item.title: End ID-45 North at BL-84
item.description: End ID-45 North at BL-84 in Nampa. Turn right on 11th Ave. South for BL-84 east to Boise. Continue straight on 2nd St. South for BL-84 west to Caldwell.

item.title: ID-45 North (12th Ave S) at 2nd St. South
item.description: ID-45 North (12th Ave S) at 2nd St. South in downtown Nampa. Turn left to continue north on ID-45 and for BL-84.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 38 Offramp
item.description: I-84 west Exit 38 offramp. Turn left for BL-84 towards Nampa and Murphy. Turn right for the Idaho Center, an event complex.

item.title: BL-84 East (3rd St.) at ID-45
item.description: BL-84 East (3rd St.) at ID-45 in Nampa. Continue straight for ID-45 south to Murphy and Silver City. Turn left on 11th Ave. to continue east on BL-84 to Meridian and Boise.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 38
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 38 - BL-84/Garrity Blvd/Idaho Center Blvd. Use I-84 east for Meridian and Boise. This is the eastern end of the Nampa/Caldwell business loop.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 38
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 38 - BL-84/Idaho Center Blvd./Garrity Blvd.

item.title: ID-19 East at BL-84
item.description: ID-19 east at BL-84 in Caldwell. Merge right for BL-84 (Cleveland Blvd.) east to Nampa. Continue straight for BL-84 West/ID-19 East for I-84.

item.title: ID-19 East Approaching BL-84
item.description: ID-19 East Approaching BL-84 (Cleveland Blvd.) in Caldwell.

item.title: ID-19 East Approaching BL-84
item.description: ID-19 east approaching BL-84 in Caldwell.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 38
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 38 - BL-84/Garrity Blvd/Idaho Center Blvd. Use I-84 east for Meridian and Boies. This is the eastern end of the Nampa/Caldwell business loop. This interchange was recently rebuilt as part of the widening of I-84 between Nampa and Boise.

item.title: BL-84 West at ID-45
item.description: BL-84 West (11th Ave. South) at ID-45. Turn right on 2nd St. South to continue west on BL-84 towards Caldwell and Marsing. Continue ahead on 11th Ave. South for ID-45 south towards Murphy.

item.title: Begin BL-84 West at I-84 Exit 38 Onramp
item.description: Begin BL-84 West (Garrity Blvd.) at I-84/US-30/ID-55 onramp at Exit 38. Use I-84/US-30 East/ID-55 north for Boise. Continue on BL-84 west for Nampa and Murphy.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 38 Offramp
item.description: I-84 west Exit 38 offramp. Turn left for BL-84 towards Nampa and Murphy. Turn right for the Idaho Center, an event complex.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 38
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 38 - BL-84/Garrity Blvd./Idaho Center Blvd. I-84 heads west towards Caldwell and Ontario (Oregon). Oddly, there are two different control cities for two different sets of lanes. Through Nampa, all through traffic is urged to use the left lanes, so it does not make since why Ontario bound traffic use the left most lane.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 38
item.description: I-84/US-30 west at Exit 38 - BL-84/Garrity Blvd./Idaho Center Blvd. Westbound I-84 traffic continues towards Caldwell and Ontario (OR).

item.title: ID-55 North at BL-84
item.description: ID-55 north at BL-84 (Nampa-Caldwell Blvd.). Continue north on ID-55 for I-84.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 38
item.description: I-84/US-30 west at Exit 38 - BL-84/Garrity Blvd./Idaho Center Blvd. Westbound I-84 traffic continues towards Caldwell and Ontario (OR).

item.title: I-84 West Approaching Exit 38
item.description: I-84/US-30 west approaching Exit 38 - BL-84/Garrity Blvd./Idaho Center Blvd. Westbound I-84 traffic continues towards Caldwell and Ontario (OR). This is a new sign as part of the I-84 widening between Meridian and Nampa.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 38
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 38 - BL-84/Idaho Center Blvd./Garrity Blvd./Murphy

item.title: I-84 East Approaching Exit 38
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 38 - BL-84/Idaho Center Blvd./Garrity Blvd./Nampa

item.title: I-84 West Exit 27 Offramp - Use Left Lane for ID-19
item.description: I-84 west Exit 27 offramp at ID-19. Use left lane for ID-19 west.

item.title: ID-19 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-19 west/BL-84 east to Nampa, Wilder, and Homedale.

item.title: ID-19 West at I-84 Onramp
item.description: BL-84/ID-19 west at I-84 (Exit 27) onramp to Boise. Continue west on BL-84/ID-19 to Homedale and Wilder.

item.title: ID-19 West/BL-84 East - Caldwell
item.description: ID-19 West/BL-84 East in just west of I-84.

item.title: ID-19 West/BL-84 East Split
item.description: ID-19 west/BL-84 east at ID-19/BL-84 split. ID-19 west goes to Greenleaf, Wilder, and Homedale. BL-84 east goes to Nampa.

item.title: ID-19 West/ID-84 East Split
item.description: ID-19 west/BL-84 east at ID-19/BL-84 split.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 38
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 38 - BL-84/Garrity Blvd. This is the eastern end of the Nampa/Caldwell business loop.
